Prove_Sphinx documentation¶

Add your content using reStructuredText syntax. See the reStructuredText documentation for details.

Utility functions: somma e ricerca web con DuckDuckGo.

Contiene una funzione elementare somma(a, b) e una funzione search_web_ddgs che effettua ricerche testuali mediante ddgs.

prove.search_web_ddgs(query, max_results=10, *, region='it-it', safesearch='moderate', timelimit=None)¶

Search the web using DuckDuckGo (ddgs) and return structured results.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – The search query string.

  • max_results (int) – Maximum number of results to return (best-effort).

  • region (str) – Region code, e.g., “wt-wt” (worldwide), “us-en”, “it-it”.

  • safesearch (str) – One of {“off”, “moderate”, “strict”}.

  • timelimit (str | None) – Optional time filter (e.g., “d”, “w”, “m”, “y”).

  • defaults). ((no timeout parameter; uses ddgs)

Returns:

“title”, “url”, and “snippet”.

Return type:

A list of dictionaries with keys

Raises:

ValueError – If the query is empty or parameters are invalid.

prove.somma(a, b)¶

Calcola la somma di due numeri interi.

Parameters:

  • a (int) – Il primo numero intero.

  • b (int) – Il secondo numero intero.

Returns:

La somma di a e b.

Return type:

int
